author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: support the http-auth-types configuration setting.
Note: this feature seems to be only supported for neon 0.26.x, not later.
It's documented in the book as being generally available though.
(serf_auth_protocols_t): add the internal code for each authn type.
(serf_auth_protocols_t): add the internal code for each authn type.
(handle_auth_header): only try an authentication type if it was specified

author: hwright
msg: Don't require a uuid for a wc-ng global relocate.  The uuid shouldn't change
when we do a relocate, so we ought not to need to pass it in.
(test_global_relocate): Remove a now non-sensical test, and change some
assertions to make sure our uuid doesn't change.
(relocate_txn): Don't fetch the information for the potential base node,
but get it out of the baton.
(svn_wc__db_global_relocate): Remove the uuid param, and do the base node
fetching outside of a sqlite transaction.
(svn_wc__db_global_relocate): Remove uuid param, and adjust docs.
